Amusement.name: Walt Disney World
Amusement.description: Walt Disney World was an amazing, it was a lot of fun with my family. It was a lot of fun to go to the restaurant with my family and go on the rides with my brother.

Amusement.name: Walt Disney Land
Amusement.description: Walt Disneyland is so much fun. I have gone to Disneyland 3 times and each time my family goes we end up go with others and it is so much fun. I canâ€™t wait to go to Disneyland with my own kids.

Amusement.name: Knotts Berry Farm
Amusement.description: Knotts Berry Farm was a crazy amusement park. The rides there are insane and are for more thrill seekers. It was messier then Walt Disney World and Land its not so kid friendly either.

Amusement.name: Sea World
Amusement.description: I love Sea World, seeing all the animals was amazing. If you go definitely get the meal plan because it makes the experience that much better. The sea animal shows are the coolest and best, definitely go to them.

national.name: Yellowstone
national.description: I live two hours from Yellowstone and have not made it very often.

national.name: Grand Canyon
national.description: I have been to the Grand Canyon.

national.name: Grand Teton
national.description: I have been to the Grand Canyon.
